thread.title_full: Decision Pending on Snow Day Tomorrow | BU Today | Boston University

author: Bu Today Staff
title: Decision Pending on Snow Day Tomorrow | BU Today | Boston University
text:
Decision Pending on Snow Day Tomorrow BU Today will announce decision early this evening 02.08.2017 By BU Today staff share it! + Click image to enlarge. 
A major winter storm is expected to hit the greater Boston area on Thursday, starting early in the morning morning and lasting throughout the day. The exact amount of snow remains unclear. 
BU Today will provide word of the Universityâ€™s decision to close or remain open by early this evening. Check back for details.
